Related repos

  • Nanotron: minimalistic library for pretraining transformer models with simple API and scalable parallelism
  • transformers library for working with machine learning models
  • Extension of Transformers for optimizing and running models on specific hardware
  • Generative pre-trained transformers for time series analysis
  • Whole building energy simulation program
  • builds a transformer-based language model from scratch in Rust
  • library for post-training and fine-tuning transformer models with SFT, PPO, DPO, and more
  • open-weight GPT models for reasoning and agent tasks
  • Transformer model in JS and HTML
  • Distributed transformer training over the internet
